transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Bhai chhote wale ko kar chhote wale se.
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello? Vrindavan electronics se baat kar rahe hain na? Sir Radhakrishna Gupta.
Executive: Jisse chhote wale se laga do baki laga do.
Customer: Ji bhaiya.
Executive: Ji ji. Sir main ha ji ha ji sir Richa baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se. I am the senior manager here sir.
Customer: Hello. Haan ji. Haan sir aawaz aa rahi hai aapko meri?
Executive: Ji haan bataye madam.
Customer: Haan ji main Richa baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se main senior manager baat kar rahi hu yaha pe. Actually sir meri team kafi time se na aapko try kar rahi hai call karne ka but call pick nahi ho raha to isliye maine socha ki main hi aapse ek baar baat kar lu sir.
Customer: Ji ji. Nahi baat hoti hai baat hui hai. Kabhi kabhi nahi ho paati hai kahi bahar hue kuch hue to baki baat hoti hai meri bhi hui hai kai baar baat hui meri.
Executive: Sir Anshu ne aapka aur Anshu ka last time discussion hua tha jab aapne bola tha ki aapko aap local deal kar rahe ho uski call ke baad sir aapne ek negative feedback diya tha sir. To wo mujhe jaanna tha sir kya hua sir matlab aapka aur unka kya koi fruitful discussion nahi raha sir aur are you facing any difficulty? Kuch problem hai sir aap mujhe bata sakte hain?
Customer: Mam isme actually main mujhe lag raha hai ki hamare liye ye koi matlab isse jo mere paise jama hue hai na hamara koi matlab nahi hai hamare to agar koi refund ho jaye to refund karwa dijiye. Kyunki yaha pe jis ha matlab ye bahut lambe ek minute.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Actually yaha pe thoda sa koi nahi ye ruler area hai.
Executive: Aap kya bol rahe hain sir aapka voice kya bol rahe hain voice ha.
Customer: Main keh raha hu ki actually ye kuch ruler area hai. To bahut se Lucknow mein baith ke ya kahi Kanpur mein to aapke waha pe sare transport hai dusre dost hai to aap dur tak dawa kar sakte hai yaha pe kya hai ki local mein baith ke to hamara ye 10 10 20 kilometer ke area padta ja ke aur surrounding mein koi lead aati nahi ki achcha aati bhi jo hai humne baat kai kai jo bhi lead aayi hai aas pass ki bas jo humne to humne baat kari to ab wo bhi local mein customer ke kuch alag tarike hote hai wo wo khali inquiry karta hai humne dekha kai baar inquiry karta hai khali mujhe inquiry wale mujhe mile. To hame kuch koi benefit mil nahi pa raha hame.
Executive: Koi bhi lead aapki convert hui sir?
Customer: Abhi abhi ek bhi listing ka lead nahi ho payi aur lekin mere paas mere kitne paise lage hue mere 37 kitne hazaar rupay kitne lage hue. Nahi to abhi to sir aapka ha ha sir ji main aapko batati hu aapka service na live hua tha 22 September ko. Thik hai approx abhi do mahine hue hai aapko service live hue thik hai.
Executive: Ji ji ji.
Executive: To aapko sir basically lead UP se hi chahiye ya kaun sa target area hai sir aapka?
Customer: Nahi. UP UP to bahut bada hai. Jo hamara bhai baat hai maine kaha surrounding bole ki hamare ka surrounding Lalganj se hamara jo area Lalganj hai to Lalganj se abhi 25 kilometer 20 25 kilometer 30 kilometer.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: To ab wo yaha pe koi jo bhi lead aati hai aati nahi pehle to aur jo bhi aayi to bhi koi matlab bani nahi inse maine baat kari koi bata raha hai ki ha koi koi batata hai ki nahi mere paas abhi abhi paise nahi hai kisi ne bataya ki abhi humko zarurat nahi hai humne khali inquiry kari is type se.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: To ye lekin sir main ye dekhti thi ki aap jo bhi lead consume karte hai na wo bahut hi jaise September mein aapka service live hua chalo 22 September ko hua koi baat nahi October mein sir aapne sirf char din hi ye portal khola char din mein aapne nau lead consume kari. Same sir November pure November mein sir aapne sirf paanch hi lead consume kari kya main sir reason jaan sakti hu ki itna kam aap lead consume kar rahe hain sir?
Customer: Mam jab ye hamare hamare range mein hai hi nahi to hamare bahut dur ke hai matlab Prayagraj hai, Basti hai, Gorakhpur, Devariya, Lucknow, Kanpur to ab waha se yaha se to ho hi nahi sakta waha ka.
Executive: Achcha sir aap mujhe bataye sir mere paas na ek ye lead aayi hui hai ab aap mujhe bataye hai to ye Lucknow ki lead sir ye Luminous inverter battery ye kare kya sir aap?
Customer: Lekin Lucknow yaha to nahi ho payega. Lalganj ki hai na sir fir sirf Lalganj ka 250.
Executive: Lalganj.
Customer: Achcha achcha. Okay. Haan Lalganj se ye Lucknow aur ye Kanpur bataya na ki ye thoda sa kuch humne humne bhi cheez bahut gaur nahi kiya to mana kar dete us samay achcha ye log jo aaye inse salah bhi bole ki sir aapko kuch nahi hum sab karenge to humne bhai humne kaha thik hai sir aur wo kuch bhi nahi kaam ho pa raha balki hum to kuch mujhe lag raha hai ki mere paise bhi sare.
Executive: Aisa aisa kuch bhi nahi hai sir ki aapke paise dub gaye aisa kuch bhi nahi hai sir dekhiye abhi na mere ko jo lead aapko ye show kari matlab wo maine aapse puch liya UP ki lead hai wo proper Lalganj mein dekho to mere paas abhi Lalganj ka koi bhi lead available nahi hai sir.
Customer: Haan ab wo bhai UP to bahut bada hai UP to 1000 kilometer ki range mein hai.
Executive: Haan haan.
Executive: Matlab matlab ye nahi ab achcha ye Lucknow bhi yaha se matlab 85 kilometer hai Kanpur bhi yaha se 85 kilometer hai. Haan aur Prayagraj yaha se 120 kilometer hai to ye bhi sab bade mahanagar hai to waha se yaha se lead nahi jani koi to ab wo ye local mein 10 20 kilometer mein hai matlab 25 kilometer mein ho gaya ja ke ya Raibareli local ho sakta hai kuch to achcha Fatehpur ka man liya kuch sambhav tha ki Fatehpur ke idhar raste ka pul hai wo bhi kharab chal raha hai to uski bhi abhi jaldi sthiti hone ka nahi hai to wo bhi nahi ho sakta. To hamare liye ha to hamare liye to matlab ye kuch ka kuch jaldi karo bhai ha hamare liye kuch iska labh dikh nahi raha hame jaise mujhe ab tak ka jo anubhav lag raha hai to mujhe isse kuch ha ye matlab ek aad mein agar chhoti moti koi lead mili bhi to usse koi kharcha nahi nikalne hai humne diya.
Executive: Sir aap na daily basis pe portal check karo aapke paas aap isse karte ho na app se karte ho na lead purchase to aapke paas na sir notification aata hoga.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: To aap us notification se lead check kijiye sir main dekhta hu main aisa nahi hai main dekhta hu din mein main do teen baar to dekhta hu dekhta hu aisa nahi hai ha aur aas pass ki bhi agar lead sir achchi badi quantity ki hai na to aap le lijiye sir wo lead lead nahi chhodiye sir. Kyunki abhi kya hai na main dekh pa rahi hu ki aap bahut hi kam lead purchase karte ho mahine ki che saat bas itna hi sir. Aap maximum lead uthaiye to aapka visibility bhi improve hoga sir ek cheez aur kya hum kuch aur product add kar sakte hai kyunki main dekh rahi thi abhi aapke catalog pe 15 hi product add hai sir.
Customer: Hmm ji.
Executive: To aapko koi brochure hai ya jaha pe hum product add kar sakte hain?
Customer: Ab hum jab jin cheezo ko deal kar rahe hain wo yahi hai inverter hai solar panels hai na to inverter batteries yahi hai ha ye aap inhi ko deal kar rahe hain to ab wo aur uske ab kya badhana matlab aur zyada idhar udhar cheeze badhane se koi matlab nahi hum vyapar kar rahe usi ko to dikhaye usme aur kya jabasti karne se jiske bare mein wo hame koi depth na ho hamare jankari na ho ya aap to ya na kar rahe ho trade na kar rahe ho to hum usme kya usko isme dene se kya matlab hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi koi keh rahi hu agar nahi hai to fir thik hai main bas yahi puch rahi thi ki we can add more products no problem sir. Baki isme isme thodi si ha thodi si variety isme jo hai display ki thodi si aur badha sakte hai ki isme kuch cheezo ko aur display kar de.
Executive: Ye ho sakta hai bole.
Executive: Kya kar sakte hain sir?
Customer: Are kuch cheezo matlab jo matlab ye luminous hai ya Sukam mein hai product kuch mein aur display mein dikha de yahi ho sakta hai panels mein thoda sa aur display kar de lekin uska koi hame samajhte koi bahut bada issue nahi hai.
Executive: Panel main ek baar check karti hu panel luminous solar panel ki aap baat kar rahe hain sir?
Customer: Haan luminous to ho gaya luminous mere paas do aapke solar panel mono crystalline hai sir panels to hai in inke alawa kisi aur panel se deal karte hai to bataye green solar mono mono per half cut sir itna bada naam hai is product ka green solar mono per half cut bifacial solar panel ye sahi naam hai sir?
Customer: Haan mono green solar to company ka naam hua ja ke aur ye mono per half cut to uske uski jo specification ho gaya ja ke.
Executive: Achcha thik hai aur product ka naam hai bifacial solar panels achcha.
Customer: Haan solar panel ka jo hai name hai ye achcha achcha.
Customer: To ab is inki iski to khair puri range hoti hai mere paas panels ki iska distribution hai mere paas to isi ko thoda sa kuch variety isme ho so thik hai sir aapko sir dekhiye abhi to as of now maine ek lead aapko batayi thi but aapne bola Lucknow to aap nahi kar payenge to mere paas abhi yahi lead available hai sir agar koi aur lead aati hai to please aap purchase kar lijiyega hai na sir.
Customer: Chaliye main purchase karta hu madam ek ek ek mahina aur dekh lete hai uske baad aap thoda sa isko dekhiyega ki mera nuksan na ho matlab kyuki mera nuksan bahut ho jayega.
Executive: Nahi agar aap lead consume karenge sir agar aap lead consume karenge to koi nuksan nahi hoega sir.
Customer: Nahi lead consume hamare isme range mein aayegi nahi to hum kaise consume karenge?
Executive: Haan.
Executive: Bas sir bas yahi hai ki agar aapko visible hoti hai to please aap dekh lijiyega abhi slow thoda sa.
Customer: Main dekh lunga main dekh lunga agar nahi ho pata hai ki hum nahi hamare paas lead aa rahi hai ya hamare range mein nahi aa rahi hai to aap thoda meharbani karke aapka jo bhi charges ho wo kaat ke hame refund karwa dijiye kyuki mera pura pura matlab paisa ye barbad jayega ye. Aap ek mahine hum aur ya man le ki ek mahine hum aur dekh lete hain hai na agar hamare.
Executive: Main ek kaam karti hu jo aapke account manager hai na sir Anju main usko bolti hu wo whatsapp pe add hai sir main nahi to main ek kaam karti hu main unko bol ke na kuch jo bhi lead aaya karegi to main aapko share kara dungi thik hai sir?
Customer: Thik nahi wo share karane ki lekin jo main keh raha hu aap thoda isko bhi dhyan de main kya kya keh raha hu.
Executive: Sir dekhiye.
Customer: Hum ek mahina aur dekh lete hai.
Executive: Refund ka dekho sir as such hota nahi hai apne paas hai na sir aapne paisa diya hai sir main koshish kar rahi hu ki main yaha se lead ka flow aur generate karaun sir aapki category mein but sir aapko bhi jo bhi lead milta hai na please aap usko immediately purchase kariye aur buyer se baat kariye thik hai sir?
Customer: Chaliye dekhta hu. Dekhta hu madam lekin paisa chaliye fir baat karta hu sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants refund as not getting leads.

- Leads are not in his serviceable area.

- Wants leads from Lalganj area.



Resolution:

- Executive assured that money will not be wasted.

- Executive will share leads with account manager.

- Executive suggested to check portal daily.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will wait for a month.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, buyleads, area, subscription, portal
